description:
http://anidb.net/ch146980 [Narihira Takeru] is a delinquent who often thinks about http://anidb.net/ch146978 [Tsukimiya], the girl who appears in his dreams. After an unexpected accident, Takeru finds himself in a parallel universe, and the world that Tsukimiya lives in. When Takeru and Tsukimiya are slain by a monster, he awakens again and realizes he has leapt through time. Now, Takeru must train with http://anidb.net/ch146979 [Abe Seimei] to fight for Tsukimiya`s life!
Source: Crunchyroll
Note: The first two episodes received an advance release on Fuji TV`s YouTube channel on 28 June 2025. The regular TV broadcast started on 3 July 2025.

REGULAR.description:
After an accident, teenage delinquent Takeru wakes up to find the literal girl of his dreams standing there.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Don`t Admit Defeat Even If You`re Dead! A Delinquent in Denji Heian-kyo!
Ne jamais s`avouer vaincu, quitte à crever ! L`arrivée du voyou à Denji Heiankyô !
Shindemo Make o Mitomenna! Yankee, Denji Heiankyou ni Tatsu!
死んでも負けを認めんな! ヤンキー, 電祇平安京に立つ!

REGULAR.description:
Takeru wakes up in Denji Heian-kyo again, but nobody remembers him or believes his stories about fighting oni.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: La confiance nécessite plus que des mots ! Le voyou devient invocateur
Shinraitte no wa Kotoba ja Tsukurenee! Yankee, Onmyouji ni Naru
You Can`t Build Trust with Words! This Delinquent Will Be an Onmyoji
信頼ってのは言葉じゃ作れねえ! ヤンキー, 陰陽師になる

REGULAR.description:
When Takeru proves to be a good battle partner for Atsunaga, Yura has some difficult decisions to make.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Don`t Just Focus on What You Can See! Yura`s Wavering Feelings
Il faut élargir son champ de vision ! Les sentiments contradictoires de Yura
Mieru Mon Bakkari Miru na! Yura, Yureru Omoi
見えるモンばっかり見るな! ユラ, 揺れる想い

REGULAR.description:
Seimei plans to put Takeru`s explosive but unpredictable power to use in the upcoming Centennial Pandemonium.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Don`t Get Used to Being Alone! Takeru`s First Centennial Pandemonium!
Hitori ni Nareru na! Takeru, Hajimete no Hyakunen Yakou!!
Ne t`habitue pas à la solitude ! La première nuit séculaire de Takeru !
一人に慣れるな! タケル, 初めての百年夜行!!

REGULAR.description:
After the trauma of losing a Centennial Pandemonium fight, Takeru becomes afraid to enter the black mist.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Come On Down, Once-in-a-Millennium Me! The Yasha Mask That Guides Takeru
Sennen ni Hitori no Ore, Orite Koi! Takeru o Michibiku Yasha no Men
千年に一人の俺, 降りて来い! タケルを導く夜叉の面

REGULAR.description:
Takeru`s power reaches all new heights, but revelations await him during the next Centennial Pandemonium.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Kondo wa Mamoru! Hyakunen Yakou no Saki ni Mieta Mono
This Time I`ll Protect You! What Appeared Beyond the Centennial Pandemonium
今度は守る! 百年夜行の先に見えたもの

REGULAR.description:
Seimei explains to Takeru the shocking truth regarding how things work in Denji Heian-kyo.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Say It Ain`t So! The Truth About Denji Heian-kyo Is Revealed
Uso Da to Itte Kure! Akasareru Denji Heiankyou no Shinjitsu
嘘だと言ってくれ! 明かされる電祇平安京の真実

REGULAR.description:
Takeru decides to aid Tsukimiya in thwarting Seimei`s World Whittle. Their first stop, Seiryu Tower.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Don`t Screw Around with People Desperately Trying to Get By! The Wailing of Seiryu Tower
Hisshi ni Ikiteru Yatsu o Baka ni Sun ja Nee! Doukoku no Seiryuutou
必死に生きてる奴を馬鹿にすんじゃねぇ! 慟哭の青龍塔

REGULAR.description:
As Takeru destroys the Towers of the Four Gods one by one, Seimei chooses to personally face him in combat.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Fight Me for Real! Takeru vs. Seimei, Souls Going Mano a Mano
Honki de Naguriae! Takeru vs Seimei, Tamashii no Taiman!!
本気で殴り合え! タケルVS晴明, 魂のタイマン!!

REGULAR.description:
Seimei tells Takeru of the events from a thousand years ago that led him to begin the World Whittle.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Change the Future on Your Own! Seimei, Across a Thousand Years
Temee wa Temee de Mirai o Kaero! Seimei, Sennen no Toki no Kanata de
テメーはテメーで未来を変えろ! 晴明, 千年の時の彼方で

REGULAR.description:
Tsukimiya makes a power play in the final Denji Heian-kyo, and Takeru must team up with Seimei to stop her.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Get Ready, Hareaki! Final Showdown in Denji Heian-kyo!!
Kakugo o Kimero Hareaki! Denji Heiankyou, Saishuu Kessen!!
覚悟を決めろハレアキ! 電祇平安京, 最終決戦!!

REGULAR.description:
Seimei deduces the true nature of Takeru`s powers, and how they are the key for unlocking the future.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Don`t Give Up On the Future! I`ll Seize the Possibility I`ve Long Desired
Mirai o Akiramenna! Nozomi Tsuzuketa Kanousei o Kono Te ni
未来を諦めんな! 望み続けた可能性をこの手に
